inheritPermissions.description: Specifies whether the new site will inherit permissions from its parent site

leafUrl.description: A string that represents the URL leaf name

onTopNav.description: Display this site on the top link bar of the parent site. Default value is Yes

delimiter.description: Delimiter of columns (by default it is just comma)

headers.description: Comma separated list of headers in the same order as CSV columns

skipFirstLine.description: Select "Yes" if your CSV has headers as a first line.

clearNavigation.description: If you specify this value the navigation nodes will always be removed before adding the nodes in the template

excludeHandlers.description: Allows you to run all handlers, excluding the ones specified.

handlers.description: Allows you to only process a specific part of the template. Notice that this might fail, as some of the handlers require other artifacts in place if they are not part of what your applying. Visit https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/officedevpnp.core.framework.provisioning.model.handlers for possible values.

ignoreDuplicateDataRowErrors.description: Ignore duplicate data row errors when the data row in the template already exists.

overwriteSystemPropertyBagValues.description: Specify this parameter if you want to overwrite and/or create properties that are known to be system entries (starting with vti_, dlc_, etc.)

parameters.description: Allows you to specify parameters that can be referred to in the template by means of the <Key>=<Value>; token

provisionContentTypesToSubWebs.description: If set content types will be provisioned if the target web is a subweb.

provisionFieldsToSubWebs.description: If set fields will be provisioned if the target web is a subweb.

spUrl.description: The action will be executed on the specified SharePoint site

xmlTemplateContent.description: The content of an XML or PnP template

sourceUrl.description: The URL of the document to be removed. You can use full URL as well as domain relative URL

spUrl.description: The action will be executed on the specified SharePoint site

sourceUrl.description: The URL of the library where the source folder will be removed. You can use full URL as well as domain relative URL

The action will be executed on the specified SharePoint site

location.description: The location of the node to add

parent.description: It is the title of a parent navigation item. If there are multiple top-level items with the same title, we will pick only the first.

spUrl.description: The action will be executed on the specified SharePoint site
The action will be executed on the specified SharePoint site

userLogin.description: Login or email of the user which will be removed from the specific group. Also you can specify multiple items using semicolon ';' delimited

allowMembersEditMembership.description: A value that specifies whether group members can modify membership in the group

allowRequestToJoinLeave.description: A value that specifies whether to allow users to request membership in the group and to allow users to request to leave the group

autoAcceptRequestToJoinLeave.description: A value that specifies whether users are automatically added or removed when they make a request
autoAcceptRequestToJoinLeave.x-ms-summary: Auto Accept Request to Join Leave

onlyAllowMembersViewMembership.description: A value that specifies whether only group members are allowed to view the list of members in the group

owner.description: The owner for the group, which can be a user or another group

requestToJoinLeaveEmailSetting.description: The e-mail address to which membership requests are sent
requestToJoinLeaveEmailSetting.x-ms-summary: Request to Join Leave Email Setting

alternateCssUrl.description: The URL for an alternate cascading style sheet (CSS) to use in the website

associatedMemberGroup.description: The users who have been given contribute permissions to the website

associatedOwnerGroup.description: The associated owner groups of the website

associatedVisitorGroup.description: The associated visitor group of the website

containsConfidentialInfo.description: A value that specifies whether the SharePoint site contain a confidential information

customMasterUrl.description: The URL for a custom master page file to apply to the website

enableMinimalDownload.description: A value that specifies whether the Web site should use Minimal Download Strategy

isMultilingual.description: A value that indicates whether a multilingual user interface is enabled for the website

masterUrl.description: The URL of the master page that is used for the website

membersCanShare.description: Allow Members to share the site and invite others

noCrawl.description: A value that specifies whether searching is enabled for the website

overwriteTranslationsOnChange.description: A value that indicates whether changes made to user-specified text in the default language should automatically overwrite existing translations made in all alternate languages

quickLaunchEnabled.description: A value that specifies whether the Quick Launch area is enabled on the website

requestAccessEmail.description: The e-mail address to which requests for access are sent

saveSiteAsTemplateEnabled.description: A value that specifies whether the Web site can be saved as a site template

serverRelativeUrl.description: The server-relative URL for the website

siteLogoUrl.description: The absolute URL of the website logo

syndicationEnabled.description: A value that specifies whether Really Simple Syndication (RSS) is enabled in the website

treeViewEnabled.description: A value that specifies whether the SharePoint Foundation TreeView is enabled in the left navigational area of website pages

uiVersion.description: The current version number of the user interface
